<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Invoice">39845cda1b0138148c5143f3cc4bcb27</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Attachment not required for atf</name><order>0</order><script><![CDATA[// onLoad function is called when the form is loaded
function onLoad() {
	var ga = new GlideAjax('global.atfIsRunning');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'isRunning');
	ga.getXMLAnswer(getResponse);

	function getResponse(isATFRunning){
		// check if ATF is running or if ATF is present
		if(isATFRunning == 'true'){
			// set the 'add_attachments' field as non-mandatory
			g_form.setMandatory('add_attachments',false);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-01-12 21:28:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c2be38ae1b5029148c5143f3cc4bcbca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Attachment not required for atf</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Invoice Portal" source="d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2">d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Invoice Portal">d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c2be38ae1b5029148c5143f3cc4bcbca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-16 15:08:22</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
